title: A Deadly Invitation
writer: Javier Durán Pérez, Anton Goenechea, Carmen Posadas
short_cast: Regina Blandón, Manolo Cardona, Pedro Damián, Aarón Díaz, Stephanie Cayo, Helena Rojo, José María de Tavira, Juan Pablo de Santiago, Juan Manuel Pernas, Mariana Cabrera, Maribel Verdú
cast: Regina Blandón, Manolo Cardona, Pedro Damián, Aarón Díaz, Stephanie Cayo, Helena Rojo, José María de Tavira, Juan Pablo de Santiago, Juan Manuel Pernas, Mariana Cabrera, Maribel Verdú
genre: Mexican, Comedy Movies, Mystery Movies, Movies Based on Books
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: A true crime enthusiast is ensnared in her high-society sister's murder. With a villa full of posh suspects, it's up to her to find the culprit.
